subject: feat(detail-panel): move labels above title as category header
body:
Labels now appear at the top of the detail panel (above the title)
for both nodes and arcs, serving as an immediate category indicator.
Previously labels sat below the title, making them less prominent.
In edit mode, the label input remains in its original position within
the edit form.
